title: Heininger HitchMate Grab Handle Comfortable Truck Bed Step Assist Heavy Duty
features: Durable & Adjustable Powder-Coated Heavy Duty Steel - Creates Easy Step Into/Out of Truck
Easily Attaches to Tailgate Striker Pin & Hinge (Either Left or Right Side)
Bracket Adjusts to Fit Most Full-size Pick Ups
Access Hard to Reach Cargo w/ Laser-cut Hook
description: Ever have trouble getting in or out of your truck bed? Then you need the the HitchMate Grab Handle. This handy tool attaches to the tailgate latch pin and hinge to create a comfortable and convenient step up into your truck. It's constructed of heavy duty powder-coated steel so it will stand the test of time. You can apply the handle to either the right or left tailgate hinges, whichever you prefer.The bracket for the Grab Handle adjusts to fit most full-size pick ups, and it's also designed with a laser-cut hook to reach hard-to-access cargo. No more crawling or rolling into the back of your truck. Made in USA.
